page.title: 13St Annes - Interview Mayor
page.content: Four third years interviewed the local mayor who thought it a privilege to be the Fylde Mayor because of the pleasant surroundings,lovely countryside,the sea and sands and little noise.Although mayor for only just over a month he had already attended over 100 functions.He had met people from all over the world in that time,the most interesting being a delegation from China. The mayor could not give an outline of a typical day as each one was different,but he was usually up at 5 AM as he had his own business to run and was rarely in bed before midnight. Improvements the mayor would like to see in St Annes were to the open air pool and more jobs for school leavers. He did not think St Annes would change much in 100 years,nor would a mayor ever be unnecessary.
